title: A ridiculous new contract - What you missed at the Miami GP
summary: The Miami Grand Prix weekend was action packed both on and off the track. Here's a look at what you may have missed from the event

qa_pairs.question: Which team secured the most points at the Miami Grand Prix?
What is the significance of the Miami Grand Prix in the Formula 1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is one of the newer races added to the F1 calendar.
wrong_options: It is the final race of the season.
It is held on a traditional European circuit.
It has the longest race distance.

qa_pairs.question: Who won the Miami Grand Prix in its inaugural year?
